Text.Page:
That Podun...what an idiot! He's going to blow my coverâ€”I just know it.

Will you create a distraction by attacking those {@LinkCreature:40#31#mutated tribladers}? Buy me some time to gather more intelligence.

And ask {@LinkCreature:240#1004$$Lashirah} to reassign Podun somewhere away from me!

Podun's an idiot, but a very observant one.

Munisk's nerves are shot, that's all.
